summary.span: Represents a set of SQL commands and a database connection that are used to fill the and update the data source.

span.span: Represents a set of SQL commands and a database connection that are used to fill the and update the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用作之间的桥梁和用于检索和保存数据的数据源。The serves as a bridge between a and a data source for retrieving and saving data. 映射提供此桥的更改中的数据以匹配数据源中的数据和，其中更改要匹配中的数据的数据源中的数据。The provides this bridge by mapping , which changes the data in the to match the data in the data source, and , which changes the data in the data source to match the data in the . 如果你要连接到 SQL Server 数据库，你可以通过使用提高总体性能连同其关联的和对象。If you are connecting to a SQL Server database, you can increase overall performance by using the along with its associated and objects. 对于 OLE DB 支持的数据源，使用及其关联和对象。For OLE DB-supported data sources, use the with its associated and objects. 对于 ODBC 支持的数据源，使用及其关联和对象。For ODBC-supported data sources, use the with its associated and objects. 对于 Oracle 数据库，请使用及其关联和对象。For Oracle databases, use the with its associated and objects. 实例时创建读/写属性设置为初始值。When an instance of is created, the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用期间`Update`方法`DataAdapter`，数据库可以将数据发送回 ADO.NET 应用程序作为输出参数或作为结果集的第一个返回的记录。During a call to the `Update` method of a `DataAdapter`, the database can send data back to your ADO.NET application as output parameters or as the first returned record of a result set. ADO.NET 可以检索这些值并在要更新的 中更新相应的列。ADO.NET can retrieve these values and update the corresponding columns in the being updated. 默认情况下，ADO.NET 调用`AcceptChanges`方法`DataRow`更新后。By default, ADO.NET calls the `AcceptChanges` method of the `DataRow` after the update. 但是，如果你想要合并的更新的行回另一，你可能要保留的主键列的原始值。However, if you want to merge the updated row back into another , you may want to preserver the original value of a primary key column. 例如，对应于在数据库中，标识列，如自动递增列的主键列可以包含新数据库分配与中分配的原始值不匹配值`DataRow`。For example, a primary key column corresponding to an automatically incrementing column in the database, such as an identity column, can contain new values that are assigned by the database that do not match the original values assigned in the `DataRow`. 默认情况下，`AcceptChanges`后更新时，值和原始值中的行，该行可能已被隐式调用通过 ADO.NET，赋的值都将丢失。By default, `AcceptChanges` is called implicitly after an update, and the original values in the row, which may have been values assigned by ADO.NET, are lost. 您可以保留中的原始值`DataRow`通过防止`ADO.NET`调用`AcceptChanges`执行更新某行，通过设置后属性`false`，从而保留原始值。You can preserve the original values in the `DataRow` by preventing `ADO.NET` from calling `AcceptChanges` after it performs an update on a row, by setting the property to `false`, which preserves the original values. > [!NOTE] > 设置`AcceptChangesDuringUpdate`属性`false`适用于所有的数据修改，而不仅仅是插入。Setting the `AcceptChangesDuringUpdate` property to `false` applies to all data modifications, not only inserts. 如果你想要编辑或删除行在相同的更新中，并且你想要禁止显示调用`AcceptChanges`仅对插入，然后而不是设置`AccceptChangesDuringUpdate`到`false`，使用的事件处理程序`RowUpdated`事件`DataAdapter`。If you want to edit or delete rows in the same update, and if you want to suppress the call to `AcceptChanges` only for inserts, then instead of setting `AccceptChangesDuringUpdate` to `false`, use an event handler for the `RowUpdated` event of the `DataAdapter`. 在事件处理程序可以检查以确定数据修改是插入，以及如果`true`，将其设置属性到。In the event handler you can check the to determine if the data modification is an insert, and if `true`, set the property of the to . 有关详细信息及示例，请参阅[检索标识或自动编号值](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-identity-or-autonumber-values.md)。For more information and an example, see [Retrieving Identity or Autonumber Values](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-identity-or-autonumber-values.md). ## Examples 此示例演示从 `DataTable` 中提取已更改的行，然后使用 更新数据源并检索新标识列值。This example demonstrates extracting changed rows from a `DataTable` and using a to update the data source and retrieve a new identity column value. 通过设置`AcceptChangesDuringUpdate`属性到`false`以保留原始的自动递增值，可随之新数据合并到原始，即使新的标识值与原始的自动递增不匹配中的值`DataTable`。By setting the `AcceptChangesDuringUpdate` property of the to `false` to preserve the original auto increment value, the new data can then be merged into the original , even if the new identity value does not match the original auto increment value in the `DataTable`. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlClient.AcceptChangesDuringUpdate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlClient.AcceptChangesDuringUpdate/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlClient.AcceptChangesDuringUpdate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlClient.AcceptChangesDuringUpdate/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法已弃用。This method is deprecated. 构造函数应使用而不是此方法。The constructor should be used instead of this method. 所有命令， 、 ，和克隆。All the commands, the , the , and the are cloned. 但是，这些命令的连接将不复制，而共享。However, the connections for the commands are not copied, but shared. 因此，克隆可以对作为原始的相同连接使用。Thus, the cloned can be used against the same connection as the original.

span.para: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法。

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to generate an exception when an error is encountered during a row update.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to generate an exception when an error is encountered during a row update.

value.span: 若要继续而不会生成异常，则更新否则为。

span.span: to continue the update without generating an exception; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ContinueUpdateOnError`设置为`true`，行的更新过程中发生错误时引发任何异常。If `ContinueUpdateOnError` is set to `true`, no exception is thrown when an error occurs during the update of a row. 跳过对行的更新并错误信息放入中错误的行的属性。The update of the row is skipped and the error information is placed in the property of the row in error. 来继续更新后续行。The continues to update subsequent rows. 如果`ContinueUpdateOnError`设置为`false`，行的更新的过程中发生错误时引发异常。If `ContinueUpdateOnError` is set to `false`, an exception is thrown when an error occurs during the update of a row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。在重写，请注意不要引用在以前调用释放的对象。有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅 [实现释放 Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息和，请参阅 [清洗向上非托管 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从数据源使用指定的一个关联的 SELECT 语句中检索行属性。The method retrieves rows from the data source using the SELECT statement specified by an associated property. 与 SELECT 语句关联的连接对象必须是有效，但它不需要处于打开状态。The connection object associated with the SELECT statement must be valid, but it does not need to be open. 如果之前连接关闭是调用，其打开以检索数据，然后再将关闭。If the connection is closed before is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed. 如果连接是打开之前是调用，它保持打开状态。If the connection is open before is called, it remains open. 操作然后将行添加到目标中的对象，则创建对象如果它们尚不存在。The operation then adds the rows to destination objects in the , creating the objects if they do not already exist. 在创建时对象，操作通常只创建列名称元数据。When creating objects, the operation normally creates only column name metadata. 但是，如果属性设置为`AddWithKey`，还会创建相应的主键约束。However, if the property is set to `AddWithKey`, appropriate primary keys and constraints are also created. 如果 `SelectCommand` 返回 OUTER JOIN 的结果，则 `DataAdapter` 不会为生成的 设置 值。If the `SelectCommand` returns the results of an OUTER JOIN, the `DataAdapter` does not set a value for the resulting . 您必须显式定义为主键，以确保正确解析重复行。You must explicitly define the primary key to ensure that duplicate rows are resolved correctly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[定义主键](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md)。For more information, see [Defining Primary Keys](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md). 如果数据适配器在填充时遇到重复的列，它会生成后续列，请使用模式"columnname1"、"columnname2"、"columnname3"等的名称。If the data adapter encounters duplicate columns while populating a , it generates names for the subsequent columns, using the pattern "columnname1", "columnname2", "columnname3", and so on. 如果传入的数据包含未命名的列，它们都将置于根据模式"Column1"、"Column2"等。If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are placed in the according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on. 多个结果集添加到时每个结果集放置在单独的表。When multiple result sets are added to the each result set is placed in a separate table. 额外的结果集通过将整数值追加到指定的表名 （例如，"表"、"Table1"、"Table2"等） 进行命名。Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on). 使用列和表名称的应用程序应确保这些命名模式的冲突不会发生。Applications using column and table names should ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns does not occur. SELECT 语句用于填充返回多个结果，例如批处理 SQL 语句，如果其中一个结果包含错误，所有的后续结果会跳过并不添加到。When the SELECT statement used to populate the returns multiple results, such as a batch SQL statements, if one of the results contains an error, all subsequent results are skipped and not added to the . 你可以使用上多次相同的方法。You can use the method multiple times on the same . 如果存在主键，传入行与已存在的匹配行合并。If a primary key exists, incoming rows are merged with matching rows that already exist. 如果主键不存在，将传入的行追加到。If no primary key exists, incoming rows are appended to the . > [!NOTE] > 当处理批处理 SQL 语句返回多个结果的实现的 OLE DB.NET Framework 数据提供程序检索仅第一个结果的架构信息。When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of for the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB retrieves schema information for only the first result. 若要检索多个结果的架构信息，请使用与设置为`AddWithKey`。To retrieve schema information for multiple results, use with the set to `AddWithKey`.

summary.span: Returned when an error occurs during a fill operation.

span.span: Returned when an error occurs during a fill operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **FillError**事件允许用户以确定是否在错误发生后应继续填充操作。The **FillError** event allows a user to determine whether or not the fill operation should continue after the error occurs. 示例**FillError**可能发生事件是：Examples of when the **FillError** event might occur are: - 添加到的数据`DataSet`无法转换为公共语言运行时类型，而不会丢失精度。The data being added to a `DataSet` cannot be converted to a common language runtime type without losing precision. - 所添加的行包含违反约束，必须在上强制执行的数据`DataColumn`中`DataSet`。The row being added contains data that violates a Constraint that must be enforced on a `DataColumn` in the `DataSet`.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Data.DataTable[] FillSchema (System.Data.DataSet dataSet, System.Data.SchemaType schemaType);

param.span: One of the values.

summary.span: Adds a to the specified and configures the schema to match that in the data source based on the specified .

span.span: Adds a to the specified and configures the schema to match that in the data source based on the specified .

returns.span: A object that contains schema information returned from the data source.

span.span: A object that contains schema information returned from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从使用数据源中检索架构。The method retrieves the schema from the data source using the . 与相关的连接对象必须有效，但它不需要处于打开状态。The connection object associated with the must be valid, but it does not need to be open. 如果之前连接关闭是调用，它是打开以检索数据，然后关闭。If the connection is closed before is called, it is opened to retrieve data and then closed. 如果连接是打开之前是调用，它保持打开状态。If the connection is open before is called, it remains open. A操作添加到目标。A operation adds a to the destination . 然后，它添加到列的，并配置以下如果它们在数据源中存在的属性：It then adds columns to the of the , and configures the following properties if they exist at the data source: - - 。. 必须设置和单独。You must set and separately. - - - 此外可以配置和属性根据下列规则： also configures the and properties according to the following rules: - 如果一个或多个主键列由，用作主键列。If one or more primary key columns are returned by the , they are used as the primary key columns for the . - 如果返回任何主键列但唯一列，唯一的列用作为主键，当且仅当所有唯一列均为 null。If no primary key columns are returned but unique columns are, the unique columns are used as the primary key if, and only if, all the unique columns are nonnullable. 如果任何列都可以为 null，添加到，但未设置属性。If any of the columns are nullable, a is added to the , but the property is not set. - 如果返回主键列和唯一列，将主键列用作主键列。If both primary key columns and unique columns are returned, the primary key columns are used as the primary key columns for the . > [!NOTE] > 基础数据存储区可能允许不支持的列属性，这将导致不正确转换某些列属性。The underlying data store may allow column attributes that are not supported in a , which causes some column attributes to not translate correctly. 例如，SQL Server 允许 tinyint 数据类型的标识列，而仅允许具有 Int16、 Int32 和 Int64属性集。For example, SQL Server allows an identity column with a data type of tinyint whereas a only allows Int16, Int32, and Int64 to have the property set. `FillSchema` 以无提示方式忽略情况下其中能准确地镜像数据源，并不引发任何异常。`FillSchema` silently ignores cases where the cannot accurately mirror the data source and throws no exception. 请注意，主键和唯一约束添加到根据前面的规则，但其他约束类型不会添加。Note that primary keys and unique constraints are added to the according to the preceding rules, but other constraint types are not added. 如果唯一聚集索引定义的一列或 SQL Server 表中的列，并且对一组单独的列，定义主键约束，则将返回的聚集索引中列的名称。If a unique clustered index is defined on a column or columns in a SQL Server table and the primary key constraint is defined on a separate set of columns, then the names of the columns in the clustered index will be returned. 若要返回的名称或主键列的名称，用于指定主键索引的名称的 SELECT 语句中的查询提示。To return the name or names of the primary key columns, use a query hint with the SELECT statement that specifies the name of the primary key index. 有关指定查询提示的详细信息，请参阅[查询提示 (TRANSACT-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/queries/hints-transact-sql-query)。For more information about specifying query hints, see [Query Hint (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/queries/hints-transact-sql-query). 如果填充时遇到重复的列，它会生成名称的后续列，请使用模式"*columnname*1"，"*columnname*2"，"*columnname*3"，依次类推。If the encounters duplicate columns while populating a , it generates names for the subsequent columns, using the pattern "*columnname*1", "*columnname*2", "*columnname*3", and so on. 如果传入的数据包含未命名的列，它们都将置于根据模式"Column1"、"Column2"等。If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are placed in the according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on. 多个结果集添加到时每个结果集放置在单独的表。When multiple result sets are added to the each result set is placed in a separate table. 额外的结果集通过将整数值追加到指定的表名 （例如，"表"、"Table1"、"Table2"等） 进行命名。Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on). 使用列和表名称的应用程序应确保这些命名模式的冲突不会发生。Applications using column and table names should ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns does not occur. 不返回任何行。 does not return any rows. 使用方法以将行添加到。Use the method to add rows to a . > [!NOTE] > 当处理批处理 SQL 语句返回多个结果的实现的 OLE DB.NET Framework 数据提供程序检索仅第一个结果的架构信息。When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of for the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB retrieves schema information for only the first result. 若要检索多个结果的架构信息，请使用与设置为`AddWithKey`。To retrieve schema information for multiple results, use with the set to `AddWithKey`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当协调更改，使用集合相关联的数据源用于使用的列名称的列名称。When reconciling changes, the uses the collection to associate the column names used by the data source with the column names used by the . ## Examples 下面的示例使用派生的类中，来添加对象添加到其集合，并显示列表中的映射的源表。The following example uses a derived class, , to add objects to its collection and display a list of those mapped source tables. 此示例假定已创建。This example assumes that an has already been created. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataAdapter.TableMappings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataAdapter.TableMappings Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataAdapter.TableMappings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataAdapter.TableMappings Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int Update (System.Data.DataSet dataSet);

public: virtual int Update(System::Data::DataSet ^ dataSet);
abstract member Update : System.Data.DataSet -> int override this.Update : System.Data.DataSet -> int

param.name: dataSet
param.span: The used to update the data source.

span.span: The used to update the data source.

summary.span: Calls the respective INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements for each inserted, updated, or deleted row in the specified from a named "Table."

span.span: Calls the respective INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements for each inserted, updated, or deleted row in the specified from a named "Table."

returns.span: The number of rows successfully updated from the .

span.span: The number of rows successfully updated from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在行的基础上执行更新。The update is performed on a by-row basis. 对于每个插入、 修改和删除的行，方法确定的一种已对其执行的更改 （插入、 更新或删除）。For every inserted, modified, and deleted row, the method determines the type of change that has been performed on it (Insert, Update or Delete). 具体取决于的更改，类型`Insert`，`Update,`或`Delete`命令模板执行传播到数据源已修改的行。Depending on the type of change, the `Insert`, `Update,` or `Delete` command template executes to propagate the modified row to the data source. 在应用程序调用方法，检查属性，并执行所需的 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句以迭代方式对于每一行，根据在中配置的索引顺序.When an application calls the method, the examines the property, and executes the required INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements iteratively for each row, based on the order of the indexes configured in the . 例如，可能会执行 DELETE 语句，接着是 INSERT 语句，则另一个 DELETE 语句，截止日期中的行的顺序。For example, might execute a DELETE statement, followed by an INSERT statement, and then another DELETE statement, due to the ordering of the rows in the . 应注意的是，为批处理; 不执行这些语句单独更新每个行。It should be noted that these statements are not performed as a batch process; each row is updated individually. 应用程序可以调用方法在其中你必须控制的语句类型序列的情况下 （例如，在更新之前插入）。An application can call the method in situations where you must control the sequence of statement types (for example, INSERT before UPDATE). 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Dataadapter 更新数据源](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md)。For more information, see [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md). 如果尚未指定 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句，方法生成异常。If INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements have not been specified, the method generates an exception. 但是，你可以创建或对象以自动生成单表更新的 SQL 语句，如果你设置`SelectCommand`.NET Framework 数据提供程序的属性。However, you can create a or object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the `SelectCommand` property of a .NET Framework data provider. 然后，你未设置任何其他 SQL 语句都由**CommandBuilder**。Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the **CommandBuilder**. 此生成的逻辑需要要中存在的键列信息。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 方法从第一个映射，然后再执行更新中列出的表中检索行。The method retrieves rows from the table listed in the first mapping before performing an update. 然后刷新使用的值的行属性。The then refreshes the row using the value of the property. 将忽略所有附加的行返回。Any additional rows returned are ignored. 任何数据加载回后、引发事件时，允许用户检查经协调行和任何输出参数返回命令。After any data is loaded back into the , the event is raised, allowing the user to inspect the reconciled row and any output parameters returned by the command. 行已成功更新后，会接受对该行的更改。After a row updates successfully, the changes to that row are accepted. 使用时，执行的顺序是，如下所示：When using , the order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值移动到的参数值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 3. 该命令执行。The command executes. 4. 如果该命令设置为`FirstReturnedRecord`，则第一个返回结果将放置在。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, then the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果没有输出参数，它们都将置于。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 7. 调用 。 is called. 这将引发同时和了已更新的事件。This will raise both the and events for the updated . 与每个命令通常有一个与之关联的参数集合。Each command associated with the usually has a parameters collection associated with it. 参数映射到当前行通过`SourceColumn`和`SourceVersion`的.NET 数据提供程序的属性`Parameter`类。Parameters are mapped to the current row through the `SourceColumn` and `SourceVersion` properties of a .NET data provider's `Parameter` class. `SourceColumn` 是指列，引用以获取当前行的参数值。`SourceColumn` refers to a column that the references to obtain parameter values for the current row. `SourceColumn` 在应用任何表映射之前是指未映射的列名称。`SourceColumn` refers to the unmapped column name before any table mappings have been applied. 如果`SourceColumn`引用不存在的列中，执行的操作取决于下列情况之一值。If `SourceColumn` refers to a nonexistent column, the action taken depends on one of the following values. |枚举值Enumeration value|执行操作Action taken| |-----------------------|------------------| |`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`|使用的源列名和中的表名如果不不存在任何映射。Use the source column names and table names in the if no mapping is present.| |`MissingMappingAction.Ignore`|A生成。A is generated. 当显式设置映射时，输入参数的缺少映射通常是错误的结果。When the mappings are explicitly set, a missing mapping for an input parameter is usually the result of an error.| |`MissingMappingAction.Error`|A生成。A is generated.| `SourceColumn`属性还用于映射输出的值或输入/输出参数回`DataSet`。The `SourceColumn` property is also used to map the value for output or input/output parameters back to the `DataSet`. 如果它引用不存在的列，则会生成异常。An exception is generated if it refers to a nonexistent column. `SourceVersion`的.NET 数据提供程序的属性`Parameter`类确定是否使用该列的值的原始、 当前或已建议版本。The `SourceVersion` property of a .NET data provider's `Parameter` class determines whether to use the Original, Current, or Proposed version of the column value. 此功能通常用于在 UPDATE 语句，以检查存在开放式并发冲突的 WHERE 子句中包括原始值。This capability is often used to include original values in the WHERE clause of an UPDATE statement to check for optimistic concurrency violations. 调用方法或方法中的所有更改将都提交或。Calling the method or method will commit all changes in the or . 如果任一方法调用之前方法被调用时，任何更改将提交时调用方法时，除非已以来所做进一步的更改或调用。If either of these methods are called before the method is called, no changes will be committed when the method is called, unless further changes have been made since or was called. > [!NOTE] > 如果更新行时出错，将引发异常，并执行更新，则停止。If an error occurs while updating a row, an exception is thrown and execution of the update is discontinued. 若要继续执行更新操作不会遇到错误时生成异常，设置属性`true`之前调用。To continue the update operation without generating exceptions when an error is encountered, set the property to `true` before calling . 你还可能响应中的每个行基础上的错误`RowUpdated`DataAdapter 事件。You may also respond to errors on a per-row basis within the `RowUpdated` event of a DataAdapter. 若要继续执行更新操作而不生成了异常`RowUpdated`事件中，设置属性到。To continue the update operation without generating an exception within the `RowUpdated` event, set the property of the to . > > 为你传播到数据源每个列，应将参数添加到`InsertCommand`， `UpdateCommand`，或`DeleteCommand`。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to the `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. `SourceColumn`参数的属性应设置为列的名称。The `SourceColumn` property of the parameter should be set to the name of the column. 此设置指示参数的值未手动设置，但获取自当前处理的行中的特定列。This setting indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but is taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. ## Examples 下面的示例使用派生的类中，到数据源。The following example uses the derived class, , to the data source.
